41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Hurairah:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever calls to guidance, then he receives the reward similar to the reward of whoever follows him, without that diminishing anything from their rewards. And whoever calls to misguidance, then he receives of sin similar to the sins of those who followed him, without that diminishing anything from their sins

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ دَعَا إِلَى هُدًى فَاتُّبِعَ أَوْ إِلَى ضَلاَلَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever Calls To Guidance And Is Followed Or To Misguidance
